missions.name: Jailbreak
missions.description: The game kicks off with a daring escape from the Stilwater Penitentiary, setting the stage for the protagonist's quest to rebuild the Saints and take revenge on those who betrayed them.

missions.name: Bank Error in Your Favor
missions.description: This mission has players robbing a bank to fund their gang activities, but things go awry, leading to an intense shootout and an explosive getaway.

missions.name: Eternal Sunshine
missions.description: In this pivotal mission, the player must rescue a key ally who's been kidnapped, leading to a dramatic showdown with a rival gang.
